pogo-1.name: Pogo Man
pogo-1.message: Fear me! For I am Pogo Man!

pogo-2.name: One Click Man
pogo-2.message: I don't see your pogo-stick. Are you some sort of con-artist?!

bug-1.name: Bug Splatter
bug-1.message: I am Bug Splatter! You're a small insect, and you think you can take ME on?! I'll crush you like the musca domestica that you are!

bug-2.name: One Click Man
bug-2.message: Your name makes you sound like you are made of bug guts. That's gross and you should really take a bath, friend.

bug-3.name: Bug Splatter
bug-3.message: That's some really big talk. I wouldn't be so sure of yourself if I were in your position!

frog-1.name: Frogman
frog-1.message: Thanks for killing that buffoon. I'm Frogman, Jumper Frogman. I'm gonna jump on you 'n' stuff, so prepare yourself!

frog-2.name: One Click Man
frog-2.message: Jump on me? That's basically the same idea as the last guy, with all the squashing he boasted. He be dead now, ya' know.

shell-1.name: Shell-Splitter
shell-1.message: Welcome to Shell City, baldy. I'm gonna split you in two and use your body to-

shell-4.name: Shell-Splitter
shell-4.message: He straight up left me alone. Now that's just downright rude...

shark-1.name: Sharkanator
shark-1.message: 'SUP looser? Git ready tuh get SHARKANATED!!! HAHAHAHA!!!

shark-3.name: Sharkanator
shark-3.message: DO YA HEAR THAT? That's the sound of my RIPPED bod screaming for blood! HERE I COME!!!

shark-4.name: One Click Man
shark-4.message: Geez... Your body is so bulky that it makes you look like your body could burst any second. Sweet Lord Bubble-Monkeys please don't touch me any of that!

orca-1.name: ORCAstrator
orca-1.message: Welcome to mein victory party, ungeziefer. It's too bad you aren't invited. If you don't mind, I'm going to ORCAstrate you into schizer!!!

orca-2.name: One Click Man
orca-2.message: (Sweet balls of fury, this guy is dressed as a jacked Orca whale...)

orca-3.name: ORCAstrator
orca-3.message: Quit staring at me like that, you'll make me blush! Sie verkehrten Hund!!!

mann-1.name: MannMan
mann-1.message: Hello, my bald friend. I am MannMan; I am the ultimate apex predator, and I shall crush you with the power of mankind. Art thou prepared?

mann-2.name: One Click Man
mann-2.message: Um, yeah, sure, but first I need to know: What is up with that infinitely redundant name?!

mann-3.name: MannMan
mann-3.message: My mother bestowed this name upon me once she realized that I had the potential to become the ultimate being. From then on I trained in the art of war, constantly learning new ways to kill until I achieved my destined position among the gods.

mann-4.name: One Click Man
mann-4.message: That literally makes zero sense. I mean- what even the hell?!

mann-5.name: MannMan
mann-5.message: NOW YOU LISTEN HERE YOU LITTLE RUNT! I AM THE ULTIMATE BEING! WITH MY INGENUITY I CAN KILL ANY CREATURE THAT BREATHES OR OTHERWISE LIVES!!! I AM THE ULTIMATE APEX FIGHTER!!! THE AMALGAMATION OF MANKIND'S INGENUITY SLUMBERS WITHIN MY BRAIN!!! I'MA KILL YO ASS!!!

agor-1.name: Agorinero
agor-1.message: My my, these mongrels that came before me were quite weak. Wouldn't you agree?

agor-2.name: One Click Man
agor-2.message: Sure, I guess. It's quite boring watching them all explode in one hit. I don't suppose you can change that, can you?

agor-3.name: Agorinero
agor-3.message: If there's one thing I know, it's the tides. Alright then, "Hero," let us do battle!

agor-5.name: Agorinero
agor-5.message: Prepare to face your watery grave!

agor-6.name: One Click Man
agor-6.message: That was some display, at least.

kronoz-1.name: Kronoz
kronoz-1.message: So you've defeated my son. He was pathetic to say the least. Now, bald man, it is my turn. I will not be as easy on you as the rest of your opponents. Are you prepared?

kronoz-2.name: One Click Man
kronoz-2.message: (Man, they just keep getting taller and taller. Are they compensating for something?!)

kronoz-3.name: Kronoz
kronoz-3.message: Why do you continue to stare at me, bald man? Has my beard captivated you like it has millions of others?

kronoz-4.name: One Click Man
kronoz-4.message: Huh- what?! Oh, hey there. I was just thinking about- uh- stuff 'n' things.

kronoz-5.name: Kronoz
kronoz-5.message:
...__________
Just come at me, you strange little man.

lord-3.name: Lord GabeN
lord-3.message: Silence. There is a bird feeding it's young nearby. Do not disturb the beauty of nature, boy

lord-7.name: Lord GabeN
lord-7.message: Alright, boy. Now you may speak.

lord-8.name: One Click Man
lord-8.message: You're the smallest of the bunch yet. You're at average height, like me. Are you sure you should be here???

lord-9.name: Lord GabeN
lord-9.message: Have you learned nothing from the proverbs of my disciples? I've ruled this land for many, many years. You MUST have picked up a few of my teachings.

lord-10.name: One Click Man
lord-10.message: You mean from the heralded Grumps of Games? I find their spouting more entertaining than anything. Sir Hanson once said, and I quote, "Canadians all have big penises and they're made of maple syrup," while broadcasting the daily spiritual services.

lord-11.name: Lord GabeN
lord-11.message: What in my name... How can that be? I spent hundreds of years teaching Mankind about peace, and care for nature. These idiots...

lord-12.name: Lord GabeN
lord-12.message: I suppose the mere fact that nine warriors chose to attack you for no apparent reason within the span of mere minutes says a lot about how effective my disciples are as of today.

lord-14.name: Lord GabeN
lord-14.message: Boy, it seems as though it is time that I disciplined this world. Prepare yourself. I've watched you grow. I know your strength. You're going to be the example to end all examples.

end-1.name: One Click Man
end-1.message: You're still alive? Didn't expect that.

end-3.name: One Click Man
end-3.message: Perhaps I should take your place amongst the Gods, since ya know, I sort of crushed the shit out of you...

end-4.name: One Click Man
end-4.message: HEY EVERYBODY, I DECLARE TODAY TACO TUESDAY!!!

end-6.name: One Click Man
end-6.message: Hey, I'm pretty good at this.
